ibis.compile
Interface ClassInfo

All Known Implementing Classes:
BCELClassInfo
public interface ClassInfo

This interface is a wrapper for different bytecode rewriters, encapsulating methods that apply to a specific class. This way, different IbiscComponents can use different bytecode rewriters. For each bytecode rewriter, the methods in this interface must be implemented, as well as the methods in ByteCodeWrapper.

Method Summary
 boolean doVerify()
          Verifies the byte code, if the byte code rewriter supports it.
 void dump(String fileName)
          Writes the class to the specified filename.
 byte[] getBytes()
          Obtains the class as a byte array.
 String getClassName()
          Obtains the name of the class.
 Object getClassObject()
          Obtains the object that represents this class for this specific byte code rewriter.
 

Method Detail

getClassName

String getClassName()
Obtains the name of the class.

Returns:
the classname.

getClassObject

Object getClassObject()
Obtains the object that represents this class for this specific byte code rewriter. For instance, for BCEL, this is an object of type org.apache.bcel.classfile.JavaClass.

Returns:
the class object.

dump

void dump(String fileName)
          throws IOException
Writes the class to the specified filename.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file to which the class is dumped.
Throws:
IOException - is thrown when an error occurs during the write.

getBytes

byte[] getBytes()
Obtains the class as a byte array.

Returns:
the byte array.

doVerify

boolean doVerify()
Verifies the byte code, if the byte code rewriter supports it.

Returns:
true if the verification succeeds or byte code verification is not supported, false otherwise.
